9 Jul 2017 at 6:00pm
Fill out information below to nominate a jury candidate for Solar Decathlon China 2018. A qualified candidate shall be an influential expert in contest-related field, and shall not directly serve a role with competing teams. Each team can nominate up to two jury candidates.
